response.overview: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.
response.tagline: They're back to raise a little terror
response.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
